ygData.subject: OOC IGL Update
ygData.msgSnippet: (Yeah, I was going to start the IGL s second round, but I forgot Thanksgiving was happening, I ve had a friend over or have been at a friend s house every

(Yeah, I was going to start the IGL's second round, but I forgot Thanksgiving 
was happening, I've had a friend over or have been at a friend's house every 
weekend for the past month and a half, I've had huge projects, I have to make 
a website for the restart of me and my friend's backyard wrestling federation 
(tho the SOBs will probably go with a page builder since they don't know 
HTML), I have to watch a lot of He-Man videos since I'm co Director of a 
Masters of the Universe MUSH.

AAAAAND, well, I was talking with a friend while or two while I was writing 
this so they made me forget.  So to wrap this huge garbelled mess up, the IGL 
will roll on Wednesday, so make sure if you're in Round Two you have your 
characters near the main arena!


-L. Unitron
